entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 40 percent chance of showers before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 7. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 5 May 2023
